column5: Sorry if this has been posted before.  I just had the link e-mailed to me and had to share.   http://www.wreg.com/videobeta/?watchId=8ba6f8fc-90a2-4711-90ea-1884ec348310  I knew it wouldn't be long before someone found a way to do something like this.  It's a bit scary.
i can see a good thing for this ...collect money owed to you from dead beats..
yeah saw that a few days ago  not good at all
Scary, I have one of those cards.
CASH, CASH, CASH thats all I carry.You want it,ya better be prepard to work for it.
Damn crooks are one step ahead.
I'm thinkin that's the way to go.  Screw this plastic stuff eh!  Both my wife and I have both been hacked several times in the past 3 years..
I have been wrapping tinfoil around my head for years to keep aliens from reading  my thoughts I guess it's time to do the wallet too.   Art
It's possible, but as yet it's not as bad as some think. Snopes has a piece on it here.
Our FAST cards for crossing the boarder has the same thing but they come with a sleeve that keeps a signal from getting out and can not be scanned when you have it inside the cover.
glad i don't have pay pass.......doubt mastercard would give  me any more credit without their system crashing

You don't need to have paypass..the chipped cards do it without having to enter a pin number. Leah found that out at No Frills here a couple weeks back when the check out gal grabbed her chipped mastercard and held it up to a sensor and ding..ding.. with no pin entry. What's the point of these "great" cards... no signature.. no  pin needed.. anyone can steal your card and use it anywhere with tap and go.
A whole new meaning to that right there...
I knew a few girls like that back in the day.....
